subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Bucknell hired Joe Susan as its coach, luring back a former Bison assistant to take over a team with three straight losing seasons. Susan, who spent the last nine seasons as an assistant at Rutgers, takes over for Tim Landis, who left after a 4-7 season to be an assistant at San Jose State.
